resources.string: An unknown room. You may encounter monsters, treasures,shops, or something entirely different.
A mysterious merchant sells his wares in these rooms. Spend your well earned Gold here!
Relics and Gold can be found in these coveted rooms.
Stop by these rooms to Heal some HP or Upgrade a card.
Hostile enemies reside in these rooms.
Powerful foes are in these rooms. Defeating them will reward you a Relic.
Strong foes are waiting in the end of the act, be careful.
